reviewText: The DVD had hardware fault - didn't load. Even the replacement had the same fault.
Excellent one hour coverage of the state of Kerala - all of the high points that I would pick after having been there.
Wonderful video on the Southern section of India where color and spice abound. Absolutely lovely video for an absolutely lovely area. How come it is not on DVD?

This tape is wonderful!!!! It inspired me to have an Indian themed dinner party to share all the interesting things, revealed in this Video.
I've watched it many times.
